title: 3 and Out - Crazy NFL Coordinator Money; Joe Judge/Matt Rhule Hirings; Rooney Rule Fail;  Divisional Round Previews; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Crazy NFL Coordinator Money; Joe Judge/Matt Rhule Hirings; Rooney Rule Fail;  Divisional Round Previews; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the insane amount of money being paid to NFL assistants, why it reflects the NFL's booming business, gives his take on the hirings of Matt Rhule in Carolina and Joe Judge with the Giants, He also previews the divisional round games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
